definitions.title: f. adj. num. ord.
definitions.body: :108 third;—[[יוֹם שְׁלִישִׁי]] Ge 1:13 + 31 t., etc. (64 t., rarely [[שְׁלִשִׁי]]); pl. [[שְׁלִשִׁים]] (third 50, set of messengers, etc.) 1Sa 19:21, 2Ki 1:13 + 4 t.; [[בַּשָּׁנׇה הַשְּׁלִישִׁית]] 1Ki 18:1 + 4 t., etc. (33 t.; sometimes [[שְׁלִשִׁית]], [[שְׁלִשִׁת]], etc.); = third part, a third 2Sa 18:2, 2Sa 18:2, 2Sa 18:2 + 13 t., + (cstr.) Nu 15:6 + 4 t., + [[שְׁלִשִׁתֵיח]] (Ges§ 911) Ez Eze 5:12 third part of thee; = third time 1Sa 3:8; also [[שְׁלִישִׁיׇּה]] Is 19:24 third (on par with other two); [[בַּשְּׁלִישִׁים]] Ez Eze 42:3 in the thirds, i.e. third story;—´[[עֶגְלַת שׁ]]: Eze 15:5, Je 48:34, v. ´[[ע]]: p. 722.—[[שְׁלִישִׁ֫תָה]] Ez Eze 21:19 is corrupt and doubtful; Krae prop. [[וְשֻׁלְּשָׁה]] the sword shall be doubled and trebled; other conj. in Co Toy. 1Sa 20:5 del. ´[[הַשּׁ]]: LXX We Dr al., so v:1Sa 20:12. 2Sa 23:18 read [[הַשְּׁלשִׁם]] SyrVer We Dr al.
